data.title: Razer Chroma RGB Lighting Ecosystem
data.meta_description: A spectrum of visual effects featuring 16.8 million colors through Chroma-integrated games, or designing your gaming setup by Chroma Studio.
data.text:
One app for everything RGB is coming. Be one of the first to control and customize everything Chroma RGB with this brand-new stand-alone app. Sign up for the beta below.

Gently pulses in a color of your choice every 7 seconds, perfectly matching your other Razer Chroma-enabled devices.

Your device lights up in warm colors to mimic the motion and flickering of flames.

Lights up upon actuation and stays lit in either short, medium, or long mode before fading.

Radiates your selected color outward from the center of your device like a ripple of water upon actuation.

Slowly cycles through the entire spectrum of 16.8 million colors for a subtle yet visually stunning look.

Illuminates your device with twinkling lights in a single color or random colors, mimicking the stars in the night sky.

Illuminates your device in one of the 16.8 million available colors, for a clean, unwavering look.

Animates all colors in a continuous wave of rainbow lights, for a truly energetic and vibrant display.

Animates a fantastic display of rainbow lights in a continuous circular motion from the middle of your device.
